exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.description: A fundamental bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
exercises.recommendation: Maintain a straight body line from head to heels.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that works the quads, hamstrings, and glutes.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your knees aligned with your toes.

exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.description: A chest exercise performed by pressing a weight upwards while lying on a bench.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your feet flat on the ground and retract your shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that involves stepping forward and lowering your hips until both knees are bent at about a 90-degree angle.
exercises.recommendation: Ensure your front knee does not extend past your toes.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: A core exercise that involves holding a position similar to a push-up for an extended period.
exercises.recommendation: Engage your core and keep your hips level.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that primarily targets the lower back, glutes, and hamstrings.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your back straight and lift with your legs.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: An upper body exercise that targets the shoulders and triceps by pressing weights overhead.
exercises.recommendation: Engage your core and avoid arching your back.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Row
exercises.description: A back exercise that involves pulling a weight towards your torso while bent over.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your back straight and squeeze your shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling weights towards your shoulders.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your elbows close to your body and avoid swinging the weights.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.description: An upper body exercise that targets the triceps by lowering and raising your body using parallel bars.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your elbows close to your body and avoid leaning forward.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A cardio exercise that involves alternating knee drives towards your chest while in a plank position.
exercises.recommendation: Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump into one movement.
exercises.recommendation: Perform each movement with control and maintain good form throughout.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A lower body exercise that targets the quads, hamstrings, and glutes using a leg press machine.
exercises.recommendation: Push through your heels and avoid locking your knees at the top.

exercises.name: Cable Row
exercises.description: A back exercise performed using a cable machine to pull a weight towards your torso.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your chest up and pull the weight towards your lower rib cage.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.description: A core exercise that involves rotating your torso from side to side while holding a weight or medicine ball.
exercises.recommendation: Engage your core and maintain a steady movement.

exercises.name: Reverse Crunch
exercises.description: A core exercise that targets the lower abs by lifting your hips off the ground while lying on your back.
exercises.recommendation: Avoid using momentum; focus on controlled movements.

exercises.name: Chest Fly
exercises.description: A chest exercise performed by lying on a bench and bringing weights together above your chest.
exercises.recommendation: Keep a slight bend in your elbows and avoid overstretching.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: A full-body exercise that involves swinging a kettlebell from between your legs to shoulder height.
exercises.recommendation: Use your hips and legs to generate momentum, not your arms.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.description: An upper body exercise that targets the shoulders by pressing dumbbells overhead.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your back straight and press the weights directly overhead.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.description: A core exercise that involves holding a plank position on one side of your body.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your body in a straight line and avoid letting your hips drop.

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.description: A bicep exercise where you curl weights with your palms facing each other.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your elbows stationary and focus on contracting your biceps.

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
exercises.description: A variation of the lunge where you step forward into a lunge and then walk forward into the next lunge.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your torso upright and ensure your front knee does not go past your toes.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.description: A plyometric exercise that involves jumping onto and off of a box or platform.
exercises.recommendation: Land softly with your knees slightly bent and use your arms for momentum.

exercises.name: Tricep Kickback
exercises.description: An isolation exercise that targets the triceps by extending the arms behind you while holding dumbbells.
exercises.recommendation: Keep your upper arms stationary and focus on extending your forearms.
